original_text: And the fourth angel poured out his vial upon the sun; and power was given unto him to scorch men with fire.
korean_text: 넷째 천사가 그 대접을 해에 쏟으매 해가 권세를 받아 불로 사람들을 태우니

sentences.original_text: And fourth angel poured out his vial
sentences.korean_translation: 네 번째 천사가 그 대접을 쏟았고

sentences.original_text: and power was given unto him
